F_SPATIAL_POSE_ESTIMATION.question: What is the pose of the <OBJECT> at time <TIME>?

F_SPATIAL_POSITION_VECTOR.question: What is the 3D position vector of the <OBJECT> at time <TIME> (in meters)?

F_SPATIAL_ORIENTATION_ANGLE.question: What is the orientation (rotation angle in degrees) of the <OBJECT> relative to the world frame at time <TIME>?

F_SPATIAL_SUPPORT_RELATION.question: Which object is directly supporting the <OBJECT> at time <TIME>?

F_SPATIAL_REGION_MEMBERSHIP.question: In which spatial region or zone is the <OBJECT> located at time <TIME>?

F_SPATIAL_LANDING_POINT.question: At what 3D coordinates will the <OBJECT> first contact the ground?

F_SPATIAL_SUPPORT_GRAPH.question: Which set of objects form the support base of the <OBJECT> at time <TIME>?

F_SPATIAL_GROUND_DISTANCE.question: What is the distance between the center of mass of the <OBJECT> and the ground plane at time <TIME>?

F_SPATIAL_RELATION.question: What is the distance between <OBJECT1> and <OBJECT2>?

F_SPATIAL_DISTANCE_ESTIMATION.question: What is the approximate distance between <OBJECT1> and <OBJECT2>?

F_KINEMATICS_VELOCITY_ESTIMATION.question: What is the approximate velocity of the <OBJECT> at time <TIME>?

F_KINEMATICS_ACCELERATION_ESTIMATION.question: What is the approximate acceleration of the <OBJECT> at time <TIME>?

F_KINEMATICS_ANGULAR_VELOCITY_ESTIMATION.question: What is the approximate angular velocity of the <OBJECT> at time <TIME>?

F_KINEMATICS_TRAJECTORY_PREDICTION_ONLY_.question: What will be the position of the <OBJECT> at <FUTURE_TIME> given its current <TRAJECTORY>?

F_KINEMATICS_TRAJECTORY_PREDICTION_POSIT.question: What will be the position of the <OBJECT> at <FUTURE_TIME> given its current <TRAJECTORY> and <POSITION>?

F_KINEMATICS_TRAJECTORY_DISTANCE.question: What is the approximate distance traveled by the <OBJECT> between <TIME1> and <TIME2>?

F_KINEMATICS_STOPPING_TIME.question: How long will it take for the <OBJECT> to come to a complete stop given its current velocity and acceleration?

F_KINEMATICS_MAX_SPEED.question: What is the maximum speed reached by the <OBJECT> during the interval <TIME_1> to <TIME_2>?

F_FORCES_COUNTING_MOVEMENT_OBJECT_CATEGO.question: How many objects of type <OBJECT_CATEGORY> are moving?
How many objects of type <OBJECT_CATEGORY> are moving at time <TIME>?

F_FORCES_COUNTING_MOVEMENT_UPWARD.question: How many objects of type <OBJECT_CATEGORY> are moving upwards?

F_FORCES_COUNTING_MOVEMENT_METRIC.question: How many objects of type <OBJECT_CATEGORY> moved by more than <DISTANCE> meters from beginning to end?

F_FORCES_COUNTING_STILL.question: How many objects of type <OBJECT_CATEGORY> are still during the scene?

F_FORCES_ESTIMATION_FASTEST_SPEED.question: What is the approximate speed of the fastest moving object?

F_FORCES_ESTIMATION_SPEED_OBJECT.question: What is the approximate speed of the <OBJECT> in meters/second?

F_FORCES_ESTIMATION_SPEED_OBJECT_4.question: Among <OBJECT_1>, <OBJECT_2>, <OBJECT_3>, <OBJECT_4>, which one is moving with velocity <VELOCITY> meters/second?

F_FORCES_ESTIMATION_ACCELERATION_OBJECT.question: What is the approximate acceleration of the <OBJECT> in meters/second^2 at time <TIME>?

F_FORCES_ESTIMATION_ANGULAR_VELOCITY_OBJ.question: What is the approximate angular velocity of the <OBJECT> in rad/s?

F_FORCES_GRAVITY_ESTIMATION.question: What is the approximate gravitational acceleration in the scene?

F_COLLISIONS_OBJ_SCENE.question: With what part of the scene is the <OBJECT> colliding?

F_COLLISION_FORCE_OBJ_OBJ.question: What is the approximate force of the collision between <OBJECT_1> and <OBJECT_2>?

F_COLLISION_FORCE_OBJ_SCENE.question: What is the approximate force of the collision between the scene and <OBJECT>?

F_COLLISION_BOUNCINESS.question: After collision, what is the highest the <OBJECT> bounces?

F_COLLSIONS_FIRST_OBJ_OBJ.question: Which object touches another object first?

F_MATERIALS_COUNTING.question: How many objects are made of <MATERIAL>?

F_MATERIALS_ATTRIBUTE.question: What is the material of the <OBJECT>?

F_DEFORMATION_ATTRIBUTE.question: What is the deformation state of the <OBJECT> at time <TIME>?

F_DEFORMATION_COUNTING.question: How many objects are deformed at time <TIME>?

F_DEFORMATION_FORCE_ESTIMATION.question: What is the approximate force that caused the deformation on <OBJECT>?

F_DEFORMATION_MATERIAL_ATTRIBUTE.question: What is the material of the deformed <OBJECT>?

F_DEFORMATION_OBJECT.question: What of the images provided depicts a deformed object?

F_DEFORMATION_RATIO.question: What is the ratio of the <OBJECT>'s change in length to its original length?

F_DEFORMATION_STRESS.question: What is the approximate stress that the <OBJECT> is experiencing?

F_DEFORMATION_ATTRIBUTE_MAX.question: Which object shows the greatest amount of deformation?

F_MASS_COUNTING.question: How many objects have mass more than the <MASS> at time <TIME>?

F_MASS_ATTRIBUTE.question: What is the mass of the <OBJECT>?

F_MASS_ATTRIBUTE_HEAVIEST.question: Which object appears to have the greatest mass?

F_MASS_ATTRIBUTE_LIGHTEST.question: Which object appears to have the smallest mass?

F_VOLUME_COUNTING.question: How many objects have volume more than <VOLUME>?

F_VOLUME_ATTRIBUTE.question: What is the volume of the <OBJECT>?

F_VOLUME_ATTRIBUTE_MOST_VOLUME.question: Which object occupies the greatest volume?

F_DENSITY_COUNTING.question: How many objects have density more than <DENSITY>?

F_DENSITY_ATTRIBUTE.question: What is the density of the <OBJECT>?

F_VISIBILITY_COUNTING.question: How many visible objects are there at time <TIME>?

F_VISIBILITY_COUNTING_CATEGORY.question: How many visible objects of <OBJECT_CATEGORY> are there at time <TIME>?

F_HIDDEN_BY.question: How many objects are hidden by the <OBJECT|SCENE>?

F_OUT_OF_FRAME.question: How many objects fell out of frame?

F_TEMPORAL_SEQUENCE_ORDER.question: What is the correct order of the objects to fall?

F_TEMPORAL_TIME_INTERVAL.question: What is the time interval between <EVENT_1> and <EVENT_2>?

F_TEMPORAL_SEQUENCE_IMAGES.question: What is the correct sequence of images showing the events in the scene?

F_TEMPORAL_PREDICTION_EVENT_AFTER.question: What event is most likely to happen next in the scene?

F_TEMPORAL_PREDICTION_EVENT_BEFORE.question: What event is most likely to have happened before in the scene?

F_TEMPORAL_PREDICTION_EVENT_BETWEEN.question: What event is most likely to have happened in between <IMAGE> and <IMAGE>?

F_GLOBAL_PLAUSIBILITY_OBJECT_COUNT.question: Is the number of objects in the scene consistent throughout the image?
